vooga.towerdefense.gameeditor.gamemaker.xmlwriters

Class ActionXMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.gameeditor.gamemaker.xmlwriters.ActionXMLWriter

  • public class ActionXMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for reading in a data string containing information about actions, their parameters, and their sub-actions. The class reads this string, and then can return a root Element for an xml file. An example of the data string can be shown below: Action1 param1 param2 Action3 param1 param2 param3 Action4 param1 Action5 param1 Action2 param1 param2 param3 param4 This data string is then converted to the following XML. param1 param2 param1 param2 param3 param1 param1 param1 param2 param3 param4
    Author:
    Erick Gonzalez
